## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [appendSlash(str)](./packer.utils.appendslash.md) |  | Appends '/' to <code>str</code>. |
|  [getDepPath(start, end)](./packer.utils.getdeppath.md) |  | Gets the dep path from start <code>package</code> to end <code>package</code>. The dep path includes the end <code>package</code> but doesn't include the start <code>package</code>. |
|  [getLocalModuleExternal(lmn)](./packer.utils.getlocalmoduleexternal.md) |  | Gets the <code>external</code> config of the <code>local module</code>. |
|  [getLocalModuleName(path)](./packer.utils.getlocalmodulename.md) |  | Gets the <code>local module</code> name from the <code>path</code>. |
|  [getLocalModulePath(lmn)](./packer.utils.getlocalmodulepath.md) |  | Gets the <code>local module</code>'s path from the <code>local module</code> name. |
|  [getLocalPkgFromName(lmn)](./packer.utils.getlocalpkgfromname.md) |  | Gets the <code>local package</code> which contains the <code>local module</code>. |
|  [getLocalPkgFromPath(path)](./packer.utils.getlocalpkgfrompath.md) |  | Gets the <code>local package</code> which contains the <code>path</code>. |
|  [getLocalPkgNames()](./packer.utils.getlocalpkgnames.md) |  | Gets the names of all <code>local package</code>s. |
|  [getLocalPkgPaths()](./packer.utils.getlocalpkgpaths.md) |  | Gets the <code>path</code>s of all <code>local package</code>s. |
|  [getLocalPkgs()](./packer.utils.getlocalpkgs.md) |  | Gets all <code>local package</code>s |
|  [getMetaModule(mn)](./packer.utils.getmetamodule.md) |  | Gets the [MetaModule](./packer.metamodule.md) from the <code>module</code> name. |
|  [getNormalizedPath(ap)](./packer.utils.getnormalizedpath.md) |  | Normalizes the <code>ap</code> to <code>path</code>. |
|  [getPkgFromModuleId(mi)](./packer.utils.getpkgfrommoduleid.md) |  | Gets the <code>package</code> from the <code>module</code> id. |
|  [getPkgFromModuleName(mn)](./packer.utils.getpkgfrommodulename.md) |  | Gets the <code>package</code> from the <code>module</code> name. |
|  [getPkgFromPublicPkgName(parent, ppn)](./packer.utils.getpkgfrompublicpkgname.md) |  | Gets the <code>package</code> from the parent <code>package</code> and the <code>public package name</code>. |
|  [getPkgFromSourceAndImporter(source, importer)](./packer.utils.getpkgfromsourceandimporter.md) |  | Gets the <code>package</code> which own the <code>source</code> and imported by the <code>importer</code>. |
|  [getPkgId(lpn)](./packer.utils.getpkgid.md) |  | Gets the <code>package</code> name without <code>scope</code>. |
|  [getPkgName(specifier)](./packer.utils.getpkgname.md) |  | Gets the <code>package</code> name from the <code>specifier</code>. |
|  [getPublicPkgNameFromDepPath(dp)](./packer.utils.getpublicpkgnamefromdeppath.md) |  | Gets the <code>public package name</code> from dep path. The <code>public package name</code> is the package name used at runtime. |
|  [getPublicPkgNameFromImported(imported)](./packer.utils.getpublicpkgnamefromimported.md) |  | Gets the <code>public package name</code> without subpath from the <code>public package name</code> which may contains subpath. |
|  [getVendorModuleExternals(mn)](./packer.utils.getvendormoduleexternals.md) |  | Gets the [MetaModule.externals](./packer.metamodule.externals.md) of the the <code>vendor module</code>. |
|  [getVersionedPkgName(pkg)](./packer.utils.getversionedpkgname.md) |  | Gets the versioned <code>package</code> name from 'package'. |
|  [isBareSpecifier(specifier)](./packer.utils.isbarespecifier.md) |  | Is the <code>specifier</code> a bare <code>specifier</code>. |
|  [isLocalModule(mn)](./packer.utils.islocalmodule.md) |  | Is the <code>mn</code> a <code>local module</code> name. |
|  [isLocalPkg(mn)](./packer.utils.islocalpkg.md) |  | Is the <code>mn</code> a <code>local package</code> name. |
|  [isPage(path)](./packer.utils.ispage.md) |  | Is the <code>path</code> a <code>page</code>. <code>page</code> is <code>module</code> which is imported by the <code>routes module</code> as a route. Check [UserConfig.cwd](./packer.userconfig.cwd.md) for what <code>path</code> is. |
|  [isRoutesModule(mn)](./packer.utils.isroutesmodule.md) |  | Is the <code>mn</code> a <code>routes module</code> name. |
|  [isVendorModule(mn)](./packer.utils.isvendormodule.md) |  | Is the <code>mn</code> a <code>vendor module</code> name. |
|  [remove(mn)](./packer.utils.remove.md) |  | Removes the <code>module</code> whose id is <code>mn</code> from [Meta.modules](./packer.meta.modules.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [resolve(pss)](./packer.utils.resolve.md) |  | Same as the <code>resolve</code> method of nodejs's 'path' moudle, But this method will resolve <code>pss</code> with [UserConfig.cwd](./packer.userconfig.cwd.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [shouldExternal(pkg)](./packer.utils.shouldexternal.md) |  | Whether the <code>pkg</code> should be external. Only <code>vendor package</code>s imported by multiple <code>module</code>s or <code>local module</code> should be external. |
|  [stringify(payload, replacer)](./packer.utils.stringify.md) |  | Convert the <code>payload</code> to a string. |
